# Country Codes from MaxMind GeoLite2 Country, used by Tor
# BEWARE: these do not match the IANA TLD Country Codes
# Additional codes generated by Tor for missing countries and missing databases
# echo "!!" > country-all.txt
# echo "??" >> country-all.txt
# Codes extracted from MaxMind GeoLite2 Country
# cat /usr/share/tor/geoip* | grep -v '#' | cut -d, -f3 | sort -u \
#     >> country-all.txt
#
# Last updated based on January 2018? Maxmind GeoLite2 Country
# wget https://geolite.maxmind.com/download/geoip/database/GeoLite2-Country.mmdb.gz
# gunzip GeoLite2-Country.mmdb.gz
# python mmdb-convert.py GeoLite2-Country.mmdb
#
# Alternative source: https://dev.maxmind.com/geoip/legacy/codes/iso3166/
!!
